snippet: A revised version of a California law requiring sex offenders to register publicly now allows men branded as sex offenders decades ago for consensual homosexual acts with other adults to remove their names from that list.    ''Gay men no longer mu...
lead_paragraph: A revised version of a California law requiring sex offenders to register publicly now allows men branded as sex offenders decades ago for consensual homosexual acts with other adults to remove their names from that list. ''Gay men no longer must face the indignity of having to undergo the annual registration as sex offenders,'' said Elizabeth Schroeder, associate director of the American Civil Liberties Union of Southern California. ''This law is long overdue.''
abstract: Revised version of California law requiring sex offenders to register publicly now allows men branded as sex offenders decades ago for consensual homosexual acts with other adults to remove their names from list (S)

headline.main: Gay Exception Is Made to Registration Law
